summary: The Azores, an archipelago in the North Atlantic Ocean, is one of Portugal's two autonomous regions. It consists of nine volcanic islands spread over 600 km, divided into three main groups. The largest city is Ponta Delgada. The islands have a unique culture, dialect, and cuisine due to their remote locations and sporadic settlement over two centuries. The main industries are agriculture, fishing, and tourism. The Azores' climate is mild year-round due to the Gulf Stream, with temperatures ranging between 16°C and 25°C.
title: Azores
